name: Pro Basketball Manager 2016
description: In this comprehensive and realistic basketball management game, take control of all aspects of a coach's life such as recruitment, finances and training, as well as direct charge of games, in order to lead your team to the top of more than 70 championships that have been faithfully reproduced!
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS VISTA/WINDOWS 7/WINDOWS 8/WINDOWS 10 Processor: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.5 GHZ Memory: 3072 MB RAM Graphics: 768 MB 100% DIRECTX 10 AND SHADERS 4.0 COMPATIBLE ATI RADEON HD 5670/NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 260 OR HIGHER Sound Card: DIRECTX COMPATIBLE Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE GAME ACTIVATION *WINDOWS XP NOT SUPPORTED

reviews.review_text: Really enjoying this game so far. A lot of love and passion was put into it, you can tell. Roster dessolate leagues need to be updated, but other than that, 5 stars for a basketball sim.

I bought this game today it's a nice game for basketball fans to have some fun but nothing special not a lot options of management and the 3d is not so realistic i recomended it as the only one decent basketball manager game

This game is ♥♥♥♥! Do not recommend it cause it feels plastic. All stats are just numbers no imersion. Main focus is on coaching and player development is irellevant. Which is kinda deal breaker for me.  UI is horrible.
Unplayable. Game crashes when going to a match. WTF!
